name: Birdie Pop
description:
Best pop-three game around! Feature cute little birds and great variety of levels. Unique and innovative "puzzle" levels mixed up with other fun and challenging levels put a wonderful spin the popular genre. The fun will never stop.

* Innovative gameplay on top of traditional pop three game.
* Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
* Achievement system for the ever more capable players!
* Most well-designed levels around.
* No IAP required to finish the game.


Support e-mail:
